s: Lindt Lindor chocolates are so good and are top of my favorites. This flavor of Blood Orange is amazing. I like to let it slowly melt in my mouth so I can savor the flavor. If you like orange and chocolate try these, It arrived in good condition. A strong box was used for shipping.
